snippet: Changes were introduced after videos showed corrections officers in state prisons dousing severely mentally ill inmates with pepper spray and forcibly removing them from their cells.
abstract: California introduces new policies for use of force against mentally ill prisoners, and they are among most detailed in nation; changes were introduced after videos, showing corrections officers in state prisons dousing severely mentally ill inmates with pepper spray and forcibly removing them from their cells, sparked public outrage.
lead_paragraph: Changes were introduced after videos showed corrections officers in state prisons dousing severely mentally ill inmates with pepper spray and forcibly removing them from their cells.

headline.main: California Revises Policy on Mentally Ill Inmates
headline.print_headline: California Revises Rules Covering the Use of Force on Mentally Ill Inmates
